Name: The Fellowship of the Ring by J.R.R Tolkien
Description: The first volume in J.R.R. Tolkien's epic adventure, where Frodo begins his journey to destroy the One Ring.

Name: The Two Towers by J.R.R Tolkien
Description: The second part of The Lord of the Rings, continuing Frodo's perilous journey and the growing battle for Middle-earth.

Name: The Return of the King by J.R.R Tolkien
Description: The final volume of the trilogy, where the fate of Middle-earth is decided in a climactic battle.

Name: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
Description: Harry discovers he is a wizard and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

Name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Description: Harry returns to Hogwarts and uncovers the mystery behind the attacks on students.
PictureUrl: /images/products/Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.jpg

Name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Description: Harry learns of Sirius Black, a dangerous escapee from Azkaban with ties to his past.
PictureUrl: /images/products/Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban.jpg

Name: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Description: Harry is unexpectedly entered into the Triwizard Tournament, facing magical challenges and deadly mysteries.
PictureUrl: /images/products/Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.jpg

Name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Description: Harry battles disbelief and authority at Hogwarts while uncovering more about the dark forces at play.
PictureUrl: /images/products/Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix.jpg

Name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Description: Harry learns more about Voldemort's past while preparing for an inevitable final confrontation.

Name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
Description: The final battle approaches as Harry, Ron, and Hermione seek to destroy the remaining Horcruxes.
